name: Cloud Courier
description:
A nice game about riding air streams to deliver packages in a village among the clouds, made for the 2021 STOPWAITINGFORGODOT jam.

Art by Albuffalo. Music by lcl.

Gameplay

  • Ride air streams located above and below each island to conserve fuel
  • Tap thrust to slow down or adjust position
  • Collect packages from villagers who're calling for you
  • Deliver packages to their recipients
  • Visit villagers to refuel

Controls

  • Climb: Up/W/Dpad up/Left stick up
  • Descend: Down/S/Dpad down/Left stick down
  • Thrust left: Left/A/Dpad left/Left stick left
  • Thrust right: Right/D/Dpad right/Left stick right

Known issues/jam shortcomings

  • Villager sprites are not positioned well
  • Placeholder menu look and feel
  • No sound effects
  • Placeholder airstream visual effects

Other notes

  • Already familiar with Godot, I participated in the jam in solidarity with all newcomers
  • I reused some main menu, settings, and custom bindings libraries that I'd made for other projects
  • Progress threads are here and here
